entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
